characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of an orange SUV, driver of a white pickup truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Ahead, there is an orange SUV on the left side and a white pickup truck in front. The road is relatively narrow, and the traffic is slow-moving.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The vehicle is positioned in the middle of the lane, ensuring it does not get too close to the parked cars on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white pickup truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: An orange SUV, approximately 3 meters away, moving slowly.
